us.fihgu.toolbox.web

Class SelectorThreadPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.fihgu.toolbox.web.SelectorThreadPool

  • public class SelectorThreadPool
extends java.lang.Object
    A SelectorThreadPool holds a number of SelectorThread
    It is responsible for balancing the work load of each Selector Thread.
    All SelectorThreads under the same SelectorThreadPool is expected to be using the same SelectionHandler and do the same task

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SelectorThreadPool(SelectionHandler handler, int numThreads)

      • SelectorThreadPool

        public SelectorThreadPool(SelectionHandler handler,
                          int numThreads)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        numThreads - the number of SelectorThreads in this pool
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • getLightest

        public SelectorThread getLightest()
        Returns:
        a valid SelectorThread with the Lightest work load.
        return null if this pool is empty or no valid SelectorThread exists.

      • startAll

        public void startAll()

      • closeAll

        public void closeAll()
        close all SelectorThreads in this pool.
        this method will block until all Threads are closed.
